ejb.integration.book

Interface IBookDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BookDAO

    public interface IBookDAO
    This class defines the Interface of the Book integration

    Pablo Albaladejo Mestre (pablo.albaladejo.mestre@gmail.com)

      • NewBook

        boolean NewBook(IBookBean Book)
                throws TransactionException
        Adds a new Book to the DDBB
        Parameters:
        Book - The Book transfer to be added
        Returns:
        true if the book is propertly added; false otherwise
        Throws:
        TransactionException - if a DDBB exception occurred

      • DeleteBook

        boolean DeleteBook(java.lang.String ISBN)
                   throws TransactionException
        Removes a Book from the DDBB identified by the ISBN
        Parameters:
        ISBN - The string which defines a unique Book identifier
        Returns:
        true if the Book is propertly deleted; flase otherwise
        Throws:
        TransactionException - if a DDBB exception occurred

      • getAllBooks

        java.util.List<IBookBean> getAllBooks()
                                      throws TransactionException
        Searches all the Books stored at the DDBB
        Returns:
        The IBookBean list including all the Books; null if no Book is found.
        Throws:
        TransactionException - if a DDBB exception occurred

      • getBookByISBN

        IBookBean getBookByISBN(java.lang.String ISBN)
                        throws TransactionException
        Searches a Book from the DDBB identified by the ISBN
        Parameters:
        ISBN - The string which defines a unique Book identifier
        Returns:
        The IBookBean if it is found; null if the Book is not found.
        Throws:
        TransactionException - if a DDBB exception occurred

      • getBookByTitle

        java.util.List<IBookBean> getBookByTitle(java.lang.String title)
                                         throws TransactionException
        Searches a list of existing Books at the DDBB identified by the Title
        Parameters:
        title - The Book title
        Returns:
        The IBookBean list filtered by title; null if no Book is found.
        Throws:
        TransactionException - if a DDBB exception occurred

      • ModifyBookPrice

        boolean ModifyBookPrice(java.lang.String ISBN,
                      double price)
                        throws TransactionException
        Modifies the price of the Book identified by the provded ISBN
        Parameters:
        ISBN - The string which defines a unique Book identifier
        price - The new price to be updated
        Returns:
        true if the books is updated; false otherwise
        Throws:
        TransactionException - if a DDBB exception occurred

        Parameters:
        Book - The IBookBean to including the data to be updated
        Returns:

        Throws:
        TransactionException - if a DDBB exception occurred
